text: I loved SHEIN so much I would receive all my orders and everything was perfect..but unfortunately I will never be ordering from here again. i ordered 14 things and I was super excited for them, On march 8, 2024 at 11:55 am I got a message saying my package was delivered at my front door. I went out to check and there was nothing in my front door I checked all around outside my house and I didnâ€™t find anything. I was like maybe they squished it in the mailbox..NO. nothing in there either. i went to get more information about it on the shippers website it said signed AND delivered. I never signed anything which really upset me. I went on  â€œOnTracâ€ costumer service to see if they help me with it..nothing happened I COMPLAINED 3 times that I wanted my package or my money because thatâ€™s absolutely unacceptable. And what a surprise that I got blocked from the website. And SHEIN didnâ€™t want to help me either.. I am extremely upset with SHEIN. And I feel like this is extremely unprofessional for a big â€œtrustingâ€ company. I will never be ordering from SHEIN again and neither will my family.
